original_text: Listen! I created the monsters called Behemoth. 40: This may be speaking about the large animal that we call a hippopotamus. I made you and I made them too. They eat grass, as cows do. Listen! I created the monsters called Behemoth. 40: This may be speaking about the large animal that we call a hippopotamus. I made you and I made them too. They eat grass, as cows do. Listen! I created the monsters called Behemoth.
korean_text: 이제 소 같이 풀을 먹는 베헤못을 볼지어다 내가 너를 지은 것 같이 그것도 지었느니라

sentences.original_text: I created the monsters called Behemoth.
This may be speaking about the large animal
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 아마도 큰 동물에 대해 말하는 것일 수 있다.
우리가 하마라고 부르는 그 동물을 말이다.

sentences.original_text: I created the monsters called Behemoth.
